snippet.title: Colin McRae Rally 2.0 (2001) (PC) (Gameplay and Replay)
snippet.description:
Playing a bit of this old rally game from 2001 (badly, it's been a while). It plays on my Windows 7 64bit system without issue which isn't always the case with these old games.
The game allows you to select 1080p resolution but as it wasn't designed for wide-screen monitors everything looks very flat and weird so I ran it in 1280x1024. I played using my Xbox 360 controller and the game detected it and all its buttons and analogue controllers (again, not always the case with older games). 
I used to play this game a lot years ago and there's definitely still fun to be had with it.


http://uk.gamespot.com/colin-mcrae-rally-2-0/
http://uk.gamespot.com/colin-mcrae-rally-2-0/reviews/colin-mcrae-rally-20-2692767/

Captured with Fraps 3.5.9 (15586)
